features.title: Feature Overview
features.subtitle: Chabod provides comprehensive features that churches need, making management easier

features.groupManagementDesc: Customize church organization management, categorize ministries and church activities

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The Chabod team is committed to developing digital tools that truly meet church needs
values.peopleCenteredDesc: Tools will not replace necessary interpersonal interactions
values.faithInheritanceDesc: The church has existed for two thousand years and will continue to exist. God will call the younger generation to love God and love the church
values.clickToLearnNaming: Click to learn about the naming origin
values.peopleCenteredList1: Churches can choose the features they need without affecting human ministry
values.peopleCenteredList2: Can be gradually implemented according to church pace
values.peopleCenteredList3: Reduce administrative burden, free up more time for caring for people
values.peopleCenteredList4: Strengthen rather than replace connections between people
values.faithInheritanceList1: New generations face busy and diverse information, need systematic digital assets
values.faithInheritanceList2: Simplify administrative work, making it easier for young generations to participate in ministry
values.faithInheritanceList3: Single entry point, gradually accumulate tools needed by the church
